testsuite.name: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I enter valid information for the question name as "Set pageFullyLoaded to false for 45 seconds"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: When I click the Source button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I click inside the Source editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I add a script tag that sets pageFullyLoaded to false for "45" seconds
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "Slow Loading Assignment"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I click the import question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: Then The import questions dialog appears
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: When I click on "Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I select the question "Set pageFullyLoaded to false for 45 seconds"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I click Import Questions in the Import Questions dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: When I click the breadcrumb to return to the class homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And "Slow Loading Assignment" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: And I wait for "6" seconds
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: Then the loading overlay is displayed
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: When I wait for "24" seconds
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.name: Then the slow loading page dialog is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create assignment with a question that loads slowly, ensure LoadingOverlay and ConfirmDialog shown on taking assignment
